A Chrome browser extension specifically designed for users of the LocalCoding.us site. This tool transforms the interface of the problem-solving section on the site, making it more intuitive and user-friendly.


What's New: 1.5
Automatic Modification
The extension now supports more accurate automatic modifications, eliminating the need to manually press the refresh button every time you want to apply changes. Simply toggle the modification switch, and the extension handles the rest, applying changes dynamically as you browse.

Site Presence Indicator
A new feature in this version is the site presence indicator, which visually informs you whether the current page is supported by the extension. This immediate feedback ensures you're always aware of the extension's activity status.

Easy Update Process
If you're not seeing the new features right away, we recommend refreshing the extension. Should that not resolve the issue, please uninstall the previous version and install the latest version, 1.5, directly from the Chrome Web Store.

Enhanced Aesthetics
Version 1.5 comes with a refined interface, offering a more attractive and user-friendly experience. We've put considerable effort into making our extension not just powerful, but also a pleasure to use.

Getting the Update:
Head over to the Chrome Web Store and search for the Class Modifier Extension. Make sure the version number is 1.5 before installing. This ensures you have the latest features and improvements.

Feedback:
Your feedback is invaluable to us as we continue to improve and expand the capabilities of the Class Modifier Extension. Should you have any suggestions or encounter any issues, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Thank you for your continued support, and we hope you enjoy the enhanced functionality of Class Modifier Chrome Extension version!
